description: Creates a lifecyle policy to be applied to OpenSearch Serverless indexes. Lifecycle policies define the number of days or hours to retain the data on an OpenSearch Serverless index. For more information, see Creating data lifecycle policies.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the lifecycle policy.

parameters.name: policy
parameters.description: The JSON policy document to use as the content for the lifecycle policy.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: lifecyclePolicyDetail
nested_items.description: Details about the created lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: policyVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: policy
nested_items.description: The JSON policy document without any whitespaces.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date the lifecycle policy was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the lifecycle policy was last modified.
